name: Trapdoors (itch)
description:
Trapdoors is a little puzzle game made for the Playdate console.

You are a trapdoor operator and your task is to help wandering blobs fall into the hatch of the same color as theirs.

Each blob that falls into the correct hatch increases the score, whereas an incorrect fall will decrease it, so be careful!

The game has 12 progressively challenging levels that will test your skill, and an unlockable endless mode where you can try to achieve the highest score possible (and make sure to share it with everybody!)

CONTROLS

D-Pad : Select a trapdoor / change bridge

Crank : Open/close the selected trapdoor

A Button : Confirm (only in some menus)

B Button : Cancel (only in some menus)

This is my first game for this console. Even if I don't own a Playdate myself, I was always intrigued by its design, and so I decided to try and make something. I hope you like the game, and if you want to provide any kind of feedback know that it is truly appreciated!

DOWNLOAD INSTRUCTIONS

As mentioned above, this game is for the Playdate console only. Click here for a guide on how to sideload a game on your device.
